SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product A WHERE 1=1
AND PROD_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND PROD_TYPE = #{prodType}

SELECT A.PK_RESULT_SEQ AS pkResultSeq , A.PK_USER_SEQ AS pkUserSeq , A.CORNEOUS AS corneous , A.SEBUM AS sebum , A.ERYTHEMA AS erythema , A.PUSTULE AS pustule , A.DANDRUFF AS dandruff , A.HAIR_LOSS AS hairLoss , DATE_FORMAT(A.REGIST_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS registDt FROM result A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PK_USER_SEQ = #{pkUserSeq} ORDER BY A.PK_RESULT_SEQ ASC
